quote: All I want to do is be at Hogwarts with you, eating turkey legs in the great hall while listening to the carols of the ghosts gliding past us. Then maybe we can go to Hogsmeade to get a butterbeer.
quote_letters: ALL I WANT TO DO IS BE AT HOGWARTS WITH YOU EATING TURKEY LEGS IN THE GREAT HALL WHILE LISTENING TO THE CAROLS OF THE GHOSTS GLIDING PAST US THEN MAYBE WE CAN GO TO HOGSMEADE TO GET A BUTTERBEER
